Package org.cleverbus.core.alerts

Alerts implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AlertsDao DAO for calling SQL queries.
AlertsCheckingService Contract defines alerts checking.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAlertsConfiguration Parent class for alerts configuration.
AbstractAlertsCheckingService Default implementation of AlertsCheckingService interface.
AlertsCheckingServiceDbImpl Database implementation of AlertsCheckingService interface.
AlertsJdbcDao Spring JDBC implementation of AlertsDao.
AlertsJmxConfiguration Alerts configuration via JMX.
AlertsPropertiesConfiguration Alerts configuration via Properties.
AlertsSchedulerRoute Route definition that starts checking alerts by scheduler.
EmailAlertListenerSupport Listener implementation that sends email notifications to admin mails.
 

Package org.cleverbus.core.alerts Description

Alerts implementation.
